Title: Prohibits the Long Island power authority from bringing a tax certiorari challenge against a municipality
Summary: Prohibits the Long Island power authority from bringing a tax certiorari challenge against a municipality.
LawCode: Amd ยง1020-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting the Long Island power authority from bringing a tax certiorari challenge against a municipality; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
